talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>You are unfamiliar to me.<sp:0:4:0>My apologies. <sp:5:0:0>Among my tasks is to
explain anything that first-time visitors
might require knowledge of.<sp:0:4:0>You may have questions about this place.<sp:5:0:0>
Please rest assured that a construct can
answer them.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>I recall that your question was about
roasting food. <sp:5:1:0>I <clr:0000>roast <clr:ffff>ingredients by
placing them beside the <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I do not eat. <sp:5:0:0>But I am given to understand
that it improves the taste.<sp:0:4:0>Our creators <clr:0000>roasted<clr:ffff> ingredients in order
to enhance their nutritional value.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Do you have ingredients? <sp:5:0:0>I invite you to
use this <clr:0000>fire <clr:ffff>to roast them.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Painful>Ah. I <clr:0000>roasted <clr:ffff>that. <sp:5:1:0>But it is yours
if you want.
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Good evening. Were you lured in by the
delicious smells? <sp:5:0:0>I assume so.<sp:0:4:0>Ingredients are especially fragrant when
<clr:0000>roasted<clr:ffff> by a fire. <sp:5:0:0>They may also be tastier
and more nutritious. I would not know.
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Painful>Careful. That is already <clr:0000>roasted<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> It will
burn if left by the fire any longer.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Oh dear. It has already grown late.<sp:5:0:0>
I will rest.<sp:0:4:0>I will return to my daily duties when the
morning-time bell chimes.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You are welcome to warm yourself by
the <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I encourage you to <clr:0000>roast<clr:ffff> any ingredients
that you have brought with you.
talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>I had not noticed before that you
were unfamiliar to me. <sp:5:0:0>My apologies.<sp:0:4:0>Among my tasks is to explain anything
that visitors might require knowledge of.<sp:0:4:0>You may have questions about this place.<sp:5:0:0>
Please rest assured that a construct can
answer them.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>I recall that your question was about
roasting food. <sp:5:1:0>I <clr:0000>roast <clr:ffff>ingredients by
placing them beside the <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I do not eat. <sp:5:0:0>But I am given to understand
that it improves the taste.<sp:0:4:0>Our creators <clr:0000>roasted<clr:ffff> ingredients in order
to enhance their nutritional value.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Do you have ingredients? <sp:5:0:0>I invite you to
use this <clr:0000>fire <clr:ffff>to roast them.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thank you for visiting me again. <sp:5:1:0>You are
welcome to warm yourself by the <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I encourage you to <clr:0000>roast<clr:ffff> any ingredients
that you have brought with you.
talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>I had not noticed before that you
were unfamiliar to me. <sp:5:0:0>My apologies.<sp:0:4:0>Among my tasks is to explain anything
that visitors might require knowledge of.<sp:0:4:0>You may have questions about this place.<sp:5:0:0>
Please rest assured that a construct can
answer them.<sp:0:4:0>An example of a question you might have
is how to roast food. <sp:5:0:0>This would be an
especially good thing to ask me about.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. <sp:5:0:0>I <clr:0000>roast <clr:ffff>ingredients by placing them
beside the <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I am given to understand that roasting<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
enhances the flavor. A roasted ingredient
is also more nutritious.<sp:0:4:0>I do not eat. <sp:5:0:0>So this information comes to
me secondhand.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you have ingredients? <sp:5:0:0>I invite you to
use this <clr:0000>fire <clr:ffff>to roast them.
talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Oh dear. Look at the time. <sp:5:0:0>I must rest.<sp:0:4:0>I will return to my daily tasks again when
the time bell rings in the morning.
